data.actual_result: The keyboard combo menu appears and you are able to send messages while it is opened
data.expected_result: The screen should return to the welcome page on the text chat
data.short_description: Opening the keyboard combos menu under the smartphone download screen allows you to type behind the menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a new Discord or Scroll up to the top of the first channel in an existing Discord - Click the blue "your smartphone" next to the "Stay connected" on your welcome page text channel - Press CTRL + / - Click out of the download screen
